title: Android Developer
nameCompany: Mongolian University of Science and Technology
description: At the Mongolian University of Science and Technology, I honed my skills as an Android Developer by designing and developing Java applications for Android.

My primary project was a REST client that connected to middleware for managing GET and POST requests. I played a crucial role in integrating a sensor system that enabled real-time access, remote activation, and monitoring of sensors anywhere in the world with Wi-Fi connectivity.
Furthermore, I designed user interfaces and implemented features for visualizing sensor data through graphical representations.

title: iOS Developer
description: At CodeWell, I expanded my expertise in iOS development using Xcode, Swift, and Objective-C. I participated in various projects, including the development of an app for the 'Summer Ohrid Festival' and an app without storyboards to deepen my understanding of constraints, views, and code functionality.

I gained experience with Google Firebase, CoreData for permanent information storage, and using third-party frameworks such as SDWebImage, TTTAttributedLabel, and SnapKit. I also designed app interfaces and created iOS animations with Bezier Path, Paintcode, and Quartzcode.
This internship offered me the opportunity to work in a diverse team setting, collaborating with people from different cultures.

title: Front End Developer
description: As a Frontend Developer at the Doctoral School of the Universitat Politècnica de València, I played a crucial role in maintaining and updating the school's website.
My responsibilities encompassed creating HTML content, applying uniform formatting using HTML and CSS, and ensuring the accuracy of the website's visual information.
Additionally, I expanded my skill set by working on video editing projects for internal educational purposes and conferences.

title: Mentor Web Development & UX/UI Design
description: As a final project of my university degree, I come to Lodwar to make Volunteering as a Learning and Service as Final Degree Project, giving people the opportunity to have a proper future through technology.
I also made some educational modules and evaluations to the students alongside the mentoring and teaching.
I introduced some tools and work-flows in the organisation that helped them to improve their services and their internal organization.

title: Full Stack Developer & UI Designer
description: At Value Villages, I played a vital role in developing a software platform designed for NGOs working on the ground to fight poverty and inequality, with a focus on vocational training and education.

My responsibilities included designing user interfaces and implementing full-stack solutions that facilitated the platform's workflow, which centered on empowering people through knowledge and fair trade training.

title: Mobile Developer
description: At Oculid, I led the development of a mobile application that tracked users' eye movements in real-time, aimed at improving user testing and analyzing user experience.

By gathering data on eye positions, we utilized machine learning to create data visualizations, such as heat maps, that helped developers and designers gain a deeper understanding of how users interacted with their products.
This information was crucial in optimizing UX/UI designs for enhanced user satisfaction.

title: Senior Mobile Developer
description: At Circus, I served as a Senior Frontend Developer on the Flutter team, working to maintain the current product and implement new functionalities to improve the customer experience.
The mobile app is utilised by thousands of users and is constantly expanding to new locations, which requires us to manage an increasing user base each month.
I was responsible for monitoring, maintaining, adding features and scaling a mobile application that is already live in production, guaranteeing consistent and optimal performance for our customers.

title: Chief Technology Officer
description: In my role as Head of Development at The Totem Studio, I lead the development process for a wide range of web and mobile applications.

My key responsibilities involve ensuring code quality across all projects, collaborating with clients to gather technical and non-technical requirements, managing a talented team of developers, supervising code development, and overseeing project launches.
My commitment to excellence and effective communication has been crucial in delivering high-quality products to all our clients.
